item.title: Interesting new C# 14 features coming with .NET 10
item.description: With the release of .NET 10 just around the corner (next month!), it’s time to take a look at the new features we can expect for C# 14. Note: the goal of this post is not to be an exhaustive list of all new features. I will only cover the ones that seem the most interesting to me. This doesn’t mean the features I don’t mention are useless, but they just have more niche use cases so they probably won’t have as much impact on most developers.
